Meanings: هرز روی سیال یا گل حفاری
flow check, actions or job's abbreviation which Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
چک نمودن جریان سیال بدرون چاه
اختصار در مورد عملیاتی است که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
Function Test, actions or job's abbreviation which Companymans write in reports
اختصار در مورد عملیاتی است که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
Flow Well, actions or job's abbreviation which Companymans write in reports
جریان دادن چاه بمنظور ارزیابی نمودن سیال درون سازند
اختصار در مورد عملیاتی است که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
سنگی با تخلخلی برابر 6 تا 12 درصد
fine to coarse, also write as : fcrs
FLUID DENSITY LOG, Log Curve name
اختصاری که برای عنصر آهن بکار برده می‌شود
FOUR ELECTRODE DIPMETER, Log Curve name
In drilling, the entrance of Formation fluids into the Well, because hydrostatic pressure is less than Formation pressure
A pipe or rod coupling with the threads on the inside
ferruginous, also commonly write as : fe
FRACTURE FINDER/FAILURE ID, Log Curve name
Any tough, stringy material of threadlike structure used to prevent loss of circulation or to restore circulation in porous or fractured formations
fld, An area consisting of a single reservoir or multiple reservoirs all grouped on or related to, the same individual Geological Structural feature and/or Stratigraphic condition
معمولا برای میدان‌های نفتی بکار برده می‌شود
SIDEWALL FRAC LOG, Log Curve name

To pump drilling fluid into the Well, while the pipe is being withdrawn to ensure that the wellbore remains full of fluid even though the pipe is withdrawn. Filling the Hole lessens the danger of a kick or of caving of the Well
The smaller of the side fittings on a Bell Nipple, used to fill the hole when drill pipe is being removed from the Well
Compacted solid or semisolid material remaining on a filter after pressure filtration of mud with a standard filter press. Thickness of the cake is reported in thirty
seconds of an inch or in millimeters
. the layer of concentrated solids from the drilling mud or cement slurry that forms on the walls of the borehole opposite permeable Formations; also call Wall Cake or Mud Cake
A measurement of the solids deposited on filter paper in thirty
seconds of an inch during standard
min API filter test. See cake thickness. In certain areas the filter cake thickness is a measurement of the solids deposited on filter paper for 7½ min
The amount of fluid that can be delivered through a permeable filter medium after being subjected to a set differential pressure for a set length of time

The filtration characteristics of a drilling mud. In general, these qualities are inverse to the thickness of the filter cake deposited on the face of a porous medium and the amount of filtrate allowed to escape from the drilling fluid into or through the medium
The pressure at which a well is circulated during well
killing procedures after killweight mud has filled the drill stem. This pressure is maintained until the well is completely filled with killweight mud
عمق نهایی چاه یا عمقی که در برنامە حفاری چاه در نظر گرفته شده است
عمقی که در برنامه ریزی حفاری چاه در نظر گرفته می‌شود
Sand particles with size between 0.125 mm
fcs, also sometimes write as : fcrs
Fishing Run, operation's Abbreviations which Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
عملیات برای بازیابی فیش یا مانده در چاه
اختصار در مورد عملیاتی است که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
Lost time due to Fish In Hole, Operations' abbreviation which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
To recover from a well any equipment left there during drilling operations, such as : a lost Bit or Drill Collar or part of the Drill String
. to remove from an older Well certain pieces of equipment such as : Packers, Liners, or Screen Liner to allow reconditioning of the Well
The procedure of recovering lost or stuck equipment in the Well
A specialized fixture on a downhole tool that will allow the tool to be fished out after it's used downhole
A powerful permanent magnet designed to recover metallic objects lost in a well
A device placed on a piece of equipment that is lowered into a wellbore so that the equipment may be retrieved by Wire Line
FIS, operations' abbreviations which commonly used in daily drilling reports
عملیات جهت بازیابی فیش یا مانده در چاه
معمولا اختصار این لغت در مورد عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
An assembly of tools made up on drill pipe that is lowered into the hole to retrieve lost or stuck equipment. Also called : a Fish Assembly
A tool that goes inside pipe lost in a well to provide a firm grip and permit recovery of the fish. Sometimes used in place of a spear
A tool designed to recover equipment lost in a Well
The person usually a service company employee in charge of directing fishing operations

A drilling Bit with cutting edges of hard alloys. Developed about 1900, and first used with the Rotary system of drilling, it is still useful in drilling very soft Formations. Also called : a Drag Bit
دارای لایه بندی ظریف که بسادگی بصورت متورق می‌شکند
دارای لایه بندی ظریف که بسادگی بصورت متورق می‌شکند
Formation Integrity Test, actions or job's abbreviation which Companymans write in reports
اختصار در مورد عملیاتی است که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
The small pipes and valves that are used to make up a system of piping
A piece of Cloth, Rope or Nylon strand used to mark the WireLine when swabbing or bailing
. an indicator of wind direction used during drilling or workover operations where hydrogen sulfide, sour gas may be encountered
A protruding rim extending completely around the Tube or Pipe with holes positioned to accept Bolts and having a sealing mechanism used to join pressure
A projecting rim or edge as on pipe fittings and openings in pumps and vessels , usually drilled with holes to allow bolting to other flanged fittings
. to use flanges to make final connections on a piping system
A hinged closure mechanism operating in a pivot manner, used to shut off tubing flow
A premature thickening or setting of cement slurry, which makes it unpumpable
معمولا برای میدان‌های نفتی بکار برده می‌شود
FLOW METER/FLUID TRAVEL/NUCLEAR FLOW, Log Curve name

A special coupling device inserted one or two joints above the bottom of the casing string that contains a check valve to permit fluid to pass downward but not upward through the casing. The float collar prevents drilling mud from entering the casing while it is being lowered, allowing the casing to float during its descent and thus decreasing the load on the derrick or mat. A float collar also prevents backflow of cement during a cementing operation

A short, heavy, cylindrical steel section with a rounded bottom and attached to the bottom of the casing string. It contains a check valve and functions similarly to the float collar but also serves as a guide shoe in the casing
A type of mobile Offshore Drilling unit that floats and is not secured to the seafloor except for anchors . Floating units include inland barge rigs, drill ships and ship
To drive oil from a reservoir into a Well by injecting water under pressure into the reservoir Formation. See also : Waterflooding
. to drown out a Well with water
A worker which works on the Rig Floor
Also called a Rotary Helper. See also : Rotary Helper
To let a well flow at too high a rate
A Well flowing Oil at irregular intervals
A chart made by a recording meter which shows rate of production
چک نمودن جریان درون چاه از سازند بداخل آن
که معمولا در بین حفاری جهت دانستن وضعیت چاه از نظر لاس یا گین انجام می‌شود
معمولا اختصار این لغت در مورد عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
F/C, actions or jobs which Companymans write in their reports
A Tubing Sub made of abrasion
resistant material and used in a tubing string where turbulent flow may cause internal erosion
The surface pipe through which oil travels from a well to processing equipment or to storage
میزان جریان سیال که از داخل سازند بدرون چاه وارد می‌شود
A lease storage tank to which produced oil is run
Preliminary test to confirm flow rate through a tool prior to going downhole
An interval device commonly found in subsurface safety valves used to protect the tool's closure mechanism from the wellbore media
F/W, actions or jobs which Companymans write in their reports
جریان دادن چاه که معمولا جهت ارزیابی میزان هیدروکربور انجام می‌شود
معمولا اختصار این لغت در مورد عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
فشار جریان سیال حفاری یا سازند
A Well which produces oil or gas without any means of artificial lift
A device to monitor rate of fluid from the Annulus
FLUID TRAVEL LOG, Log Curve name
The unit weight of fluid, e.g. : Pounds Per Gallon

The state in fluid dynamics of a fluid in motion is determined by the type of fluid e.g., Newtonian, plastic, pseudoplastic, dilatant ; the properties of the fluid such as viscosity and density; the geometry of the system; and the velocity. Thus, under a given set of conditions and fluid properties, the fluid flow can be described as plug flow, laminar called also Newtonian, streamline, parallel, or viscous flow, or turbulent flow
FIH, the Fluid which is in the Well
Injection of gases or liquids into a reservoir to force oil toward and into producing wells
Distance between well head and point to which fluid rises in the well
هرز روی سیال یا گل حفاری
The unwanted migration of the liquid part of the drilling mud or cement slurry into a Formation, often minimized or prevented by the blending of additives with the Mud or Cement
The amount of the pore volume of a reservoir rock that is filled by water, oil, or gas and measured in routine core analysis
emission of light of a greater wave length than that light originally absorbed
A Casing in which the outside diameter of the joint is the same as the outside diameter of the casing itself, Also called : Flush
The high rate of flow made by a good well right after it is drilled
زون یا ناحیه ای اطراف چاه که سیال سازند به منطقه دور‌تر رانده شده
Pipe in which the outside diameter of the joint is the same as the outside diameter of the tube. Pipe may also be internally flush
لاگ ارزیابی سازند در ناحیه نزدیک دیواره چاه
FORMATION MICRO SCANNER, Log Curve name

A bed or deposit composed throughout of substantially the same kind of rock; often a Lithologic Unit. Each Formation is given a name, frequently as a result of the study of the Formation outcrop at the surface and sometimes based on Fossils found in the Formation
An event occurring when borehole pressure is of such magnitude that the exposed formation cannot withstand applied pressure
A test used to determine the amount of pressure required to cause a Formation to fracture
The reduction of permeability in a reservoir rock caused by the invasion of drilling fluid and treating fluids to the section adjacent to the wellbore. Often call : Skin Damage
Fluid, such as : Gas, Oil, or Water that exists in a subsurface rock Formation
The point at which a Formation will crack from pressure in the Well

A method of stimulating production by opening new flow channels in the rock surrounding a production well. Often call a frac job. Under extremely high hydraulic pressure, a fluid such as distillate, diesel fuel, crude oil, dilute hydrochloric acid, water, or kerosene is pumped downward through production tubing or drill pipe and forced out below a packer or between two packers. The pressure causes cracks to open in the formation, and the fluid penetrates the formation through the cracks. Sand grains, aluminum pellets, walnut shells, or similar materials propping agents are carried in suspension by the fluid into the cracks. When the pressure is released at the surface, the fracturing fluid returns to the well. The cracks partially close on the pellets, leaving channels for oil to flow around them to the well. See also : Explosive Fracturing, Hydraulic Fracturing
اختصار در مورد عملیاتی است که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
تست یا ارزیابی فواصل مختلف سازند
لاگ ارزیابی سازند در ناحیه نزدیک دیواره چاه
Pressure at the bottom of a Well that is shut in

The gathering of pressure data and fluid samples from a formation to determine its production potential before choosing a completion method. Testing tools include formation testers and drill stem test tools
FTR, operations' abbreviations use in drilling reports
عملیات جهت بهینه سازی وضعیت سازند
معمولا اختصار این لغت در مورد عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
The first casing or conductor string generally with a diameter of 30 to 36 inches set when drilling a well from an offshore drilling rig. It prevents sloughing of the ocean
floor formations and is a structural support for the permanent guide base and the blowout preventers
A section of Drill Pipe, Casing, or Tubing consisting of four joints screwed together. Compare also with : Double, Single, Thribble
جداری یا مغزی که از چهار شاخه پیچ شده و متصل بهم تشکیل شده است
The elevation of Monkeyboard which is equal to 4 Drilling Pipes
سکوی دکلبان که به بلندی چهار طول شاخه لوله‌های حفاری است
فشار جریان سیال حفاری یا سازند
سنگی با تخلخلی برابر 6 تا 12 درصد
اختصاری است که جهت سفت و سخت بودن نیز بکار می‌رود
اختصاری است که جهت تخلخلی برابر 6 تا 12 درصد نیز بکار می‌رود

A procedure by which acid is forced into a formation under pressure high enough to cause the formation to crack. The acid acts on certain kinds of rocks, usually carbonates, to increase the permeability of the Formation. Compare also with : Matrix Acidizing
The pressure at which a Formation will break down, or fracture
An area or point above the point at which a tubular, such as drill pipe, is stuck in the Well
Water produced with oil. It usually settles out within five minutes when the well fluids become stationary in a settling space within a vessel
. the measured volume of water that is present in a container and that is not in suspension in the contained liquid at observed temperature

A device run on wireline into the wellbore and inside the fishing string and fish to locate the area where a fish is stuck. When the drill string is pulled and turned, the electromagnetic fields of free pipe and stuck pipe differ. The free
point indicator is able to distinguish these differences, which are registered on a metering device at the surface
The depth in the hole at which the tubing, casing, or drill pipe is stuck
working on Fish, a kind of Operation or action or job's abbreviation which Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
کار بر روی فیش یا مانده درون چاه
اختصار در مورد عملیاتی است که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
Time actually spent for working on Fish In Hole, Operations' abbreviation which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
Formation treatment run, operation's Abbreviations use in Companyman's daily drilling reports
عملیات مربوط به بهینه سازی سازند
اختصار در مورد عملیاتی است که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
F/T, actions or jobs which Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
تست یا ارزیابی عملکرد ابزار یا وسیله ای
معمولا اختصار این لغت در مورد عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
Viscosity as measured by the Marsh Funnel, based on the number of second it takes for 1,000 cubic centimeters of drilling fluid to flow through the funnel
